downloadDescription: The OMS Forwarder is a tool that sends data from devices with no Internet connectivity to OMS.

downloadFile.name: OMG Log Analytics Forwarder Official Documentation.docx

detailsSection: The OMS Log Analytics Forwarder enables customers send data to a central server which has access to the Internet. OMS Log Analytics Forwarder is a HTTP forward proxy that supports HTTP tunneling via HTTP CONNECT command. The Forwarder can handle up to 1000 OMS concurrent connected devices if run on a 4 core CPU, 8GB Windows Server with a 1Gbps network connection. In order to use the OMS Log Analytics Forwarder, you neeed to install the OMS agent on the Forwarder Server.
detailsSection_file_name: OMG Log Analytics Forwarder Official Documentation.docx
systemRequirementsSection:
•Client SKU: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 


•Server SKU: W2K8 R2, W2012, W2012R2
installInstructionSection:
1. Install the OMS agent on the server you are going to install the Forwarder

2. Install the OMS Log Analytics Forwarder

3. Configure OMS agents to use the OMS Log Analytics Forwarder to send data
